price: Umusi nya ruzitiro rwasenyutse, Twebwe Allah, Tuzorekura Ya-juuja na Ma-juuja bashwiragire maze bahungabanye abantu gushika ku muhero w'isi, hanyuma inzamba igira kabiri yo kuzuka ivuzwe, Duheze Twegeranirize ibiremwa vyose hamwe, kugira Tubiharurire maze Tubihembere ivyo vyakoze.
arabic: ۞ وَتَرَكۡنَا بَعۡضَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَمُوجُ فِي بَعۡضٖۖ وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَجَمَعۡنَٰهُمۡ جَمۡعٗا

meta.transliteration: wataraknā baʿḍahum yawma-idhin yamūju fī baʿḍin wanufikha fī al-ṣūri fajamaʿnāhum jamʿan
